column4: Here's a problem to access soundcard: 0 [NVidia         ]: HDA-Intel - HDA NVidia
I have and nVidia HDA chip as well, it works, but sometimes not very well
the proc tells it works but I cannot hear any sound, even playing cd
what does it say in System->Preferences->Sound ?
is there any reason you switched it from autodetect? werre there problems with that too?
all settings are autodected. Have no sound at all
have you tried setting it to pulseaudio?
crap, sorry, I have to go, good luck!
in sound preferences, there are drop-down menus for different types of audio input/output
try selecting pulesaudio for the playback ones, see if it works
